introduction_key3: **JSON** *( Javascript Object Notation)* mai hum data ko `keys` and values ki form mai likhtain hain. Ismain `keys` `string` hoti hai aur values kisi bhi data type main ho sakti hain. `Keys` and values  colon ( : ) se separated hoti hain. Curly braces ” { }” Json ko represent karta hain. Json `files` ka extension ( .json ) hota hain.
introduction_key5: Json Jyada tar  server se web `application` or web `application` se server  ke beech data transmit karne ke kaam aata hain.
introduction_key6: Web services and APIs json format ka use  public data dene me use karte hain.
introduction_key7: Aur ye modern programming mai bhi use hota hai etc.
introduction_key9: Json padhne aur likhne mai aasan hota hai.
introduction_key10: Json language ek independent language hai. Ye kisi par nirbhar nahi hain.
introduction_key11: Ye light weight and text-based interchange format hai.
introduction_key13: Data humesha `keys` and values ki form mai hona chahiye.
introduction_key14: Data humesha comma se separated hona chahiye.
introduction_key15: Data curly braces ({ }) mai hota hai.
introduction_key16: Data jo square brackets ( [ ] ) mai hota hai usse Array kehte hai.
introduction_key17: Hum kuch data ko `python` se json format mai kar sakte hai jaise(dict,list,tuple,`string`,int,`float`,`True`,`False`,None).
introduction_key18: *Jum hum `python` se data json mai convert karte hai toh unka Data type change ho jata hai. Jaise ki neeche diya gaya hai:-*
introduction_key19:
| `Python`        | Json           | 
| ------------- |:-------------:| -----:|
| Dict     | Object |
| List      | Array    |   
|Tuple | Array   |  
| Str     | `String` |
| int      | Number    |   
|`True` | `true`   |   
| `False`     | `false` | 
|None | null   |
